description: Parks Canada Agency has a requirement for the purchase, and delivery of office seating to 201 Village Road, Lake Louise, AB T0L 1E0 by March 16, 2023. This requirement was following the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid. The non-SA holders cannot be awarded a contract unless and until the SAA has issued an SA to that supplier for the products and services contained in the bid.
full_summary:
### Office Chairs – Parks Canada Agency, Lake Louise, AB

Government Tender Announcement
====

### Solicitation Number
* **Solicitation Number-numeroSollicitation**: 5P420-22-0039/A

### Brief Description
Parks Canada Agency requires the purchase and delivery of office seating to 201 Village Road, Lake Louise, AB T0L 1E0 by March 16, 2023.

### Tender Details
- **Bid Submission Method**: Only eligible bidders who have been pre-qualified under the General Stream (Supply Arrangement) are invited to submit a bid. Non- Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders may submit a bid to the Identified User (IU), but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation. Suppliers must use the format provided in the Solicitation Document.
- **Bid Submission Deadline**: January 19, 2023, 16:00 EST
- **Bid Submission Contact**: McGraw-Alcock, Andrea, andrea.mcgraw-alcock@pc.gc.ca, 587-436-5908

### Important Considerations
- This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- Security requirements are not associated with this bid.
- Suppliers must be aware that the maximum email file size that Parks Canada is capable of receiving is 15 megabytes.
- To expedite the bid submission process, suppliers are encouraged to submit their bid in multiple emails, properly labeled with the solicitation number, project name, and indicating how many emails are included.
- Emails containing links to bid documents will not be accepted; bid documents must be sent as email attachments.

### Documents
Please note that the solicitation documents can be accessed at the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/5a14f28756456ab2b600fc80abdcd451/en-5p420-22-0039a-rfb.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/76d664d306f1ba30db49f22f28815293/5p420-22-0039a-solam06.pdf

Please direct all inquiries to the Contracting Authority, Parks Canada Agency.

Note: While I rewrote the text, I had to extract some important information about bid submission process and documents from the original text
